name: Omega Station
description:
V1.1

  • Re wrote level generation to reduce bugs in the generation and make the levels abit more open
  • Map now has to be revealed by the player
  • Re wrote gui to present item stats visually rather than as a number

A Vertical slice of a procedurally generated roguelike that I developed for my third year university project.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Mouse - Aim/Shoot

I - Inventory/Map Screen

E - Interact/Pickup Item

Music was from https://incompetech.com/
